definition: to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Chronic phase appearance of radiation hepatitis is similar to that of hepatocirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 慢性期放射性肝損傷類似肝硬化之表現。

sentences.english: The two other patients were cirrhotic , but had no further identifiable risk factors.
sentences.chinese: 其它兩個病人有肝硬化，但並未發現其他危險因素。

sentences.english: Occurrence liver of second liver patient is sclerotic , can be ascites still treated?
sentences.chinese: 乙肝患者出現肝硬化，腹水還能治療好嗎？

sentences.english: Objective To assess the curative effect of hepatic cerebropathy with naloxone.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價納絡酮治療肝硬化肝性腦病的療效。

sentences.english: Methods The clinical data of 24 patients with cholelithiasis and cirrhosis receiving operation were summarized.
sentences.chinese: 方法總結24例膽石症合併肝硬化外科治療的病例。

sentences.english: None showed histologic features of the presumed underlying liver disease.
sentences.chinese: 沒有人出現假定爲肝硬化時的組織學特徵。

sentences.english: Bleeding esophageal varices may be the first manifestation of cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 出血性食管靜脈曲張可能是肝硬化的首要表現。

sentences.english: China is still some way off the cirrhosis death rates seen in Britain or Japan.
sentences.chinese: 這句話是說中國肝硬化發病率比英國和日本的低吧？

sentences.english: Objective To probe into the influence of Proteus infection on the blood ammonia levels of cirrhotic sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討變形桿菌感染對肝硬化患者血氨的影響。

sentences.english: Prof Bernardi: It is true that patients with cirrhosis are highly susceptible to bacterial infections.
sentences.chinese: 肝硬化患者確實對細菌感染高度敏感。

sentences.english: Objective The aim of this study was to describe the interdigestive gastroduodenal motility in patients with decompensated cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究肝硬化失代償期患者空腹胃腸動力有無異常。

sentences.english: Cirrhosis of the liver is life threatening.
sentences.chinese: 肝硬化是威脅到生命安全的。

sentences.english: Objective To observe clinical effects of ascites due to cirrhosis treated with Xiao Zhang Li Shui mixture.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察消脹利水合劑治療肝硬化腹水的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: To observe the therapeutic effect of GFL (Gan Fu Le) in the treatment of hepatitis liver cirrhosis.
sentences.chinese: 探討肝復樂片治療肝炎肝硬化的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Gallstones and cirrhosis of the liver – both lowered by drinking coffee.
sentences.chinese: 膽石和肝硬化都會因爲和咖啡而降低發病率。

sentences.english: Methods One case of AIH with hepatocirrhosis was treated by orthotopic liver transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 方法對1例AIH肝硬化患者行肝移植手術。
